text: (kya ye allaah ke haq ko nahin pahachaanate) ya use chhodakar inhonne doosare isht-poojy bana lie hai (jisake lie inake paas kuchh pramaan hai)? kah do, "lao, apana pramaan! yah anusmrti hai unakee jo mere saath hai aur anusmrti hai unakee jo mujhase pahale hue hai, kintu baat yah hai ki inamen adhikatar saty ko jaanate nahin, isalie katara rahe hai
